dt: {bc}having, showing, or involving feelings of sexual attraction for both sexes

dt.t: … an impudent college conservative from Iowa mortified at this tribe's {wi}ambisexual{/wi} practices …

dt: {bc}having qualities or characteristics associated with both sexes {bc}sexually {d_link|ambiguous|ambiguous}

dt.t: … his new image is less campy, less outrageously {wi}ambisexual{/wi} than before—in the movie, he basically pursues one girl; and he's toned down his old costume of bikini underpants and lace gloves.

dt: {bc}suitable or designed for both males and females {bc}{sx|unisex||}

dt.t: The patterns also are available for men because VanMartin believes in "{wi}ambisexual{/wi} fashion."

shortdef: having, showing, or involving feelings of sexual attraction for both sexes
having qualities or characteristics associated with both sexes : sexually ambiguous
